phases.description: Project setup, architecture design, and core infrastructure
Email integration, request creation, and status management
User management, assignment workflow, and notification system
State diagram import, validation interface, and data correction
Peer review system, approval process, and adjustment handling
System integrations, comprehensive testing, and deployment preparation

tasks.title: Project Setup and Blazor Architecture
tasks.description: Initialize ASP.NET Blazor project structure with proper architecture, authentication framework, and development environment setup

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given the project requirements, when setting up the Blazor project, then the solution structure includes proper separation of concerns with shared libraries, server project, and client components
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Project builds successfully and can be deployed locally

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given security requirements, when implementing authentication, then the system integrates with organizational AD groups for user authentication
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Users can authenticate using organizational credentials

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given development standards, when setting up CI/CD, then code can be built and deployed through automated pipelines
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Automated build and deployment pipeline is functional

risk_factors.mitigation: Create fallback authentication for development environment

tasks.title: Database Design and Entity Framework Setup
tasks.description: Design and implement database schema for requests, users, reviews, and state data with Entity Framework Code First approach

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given the domain model, when designing the database schema, then all core entities (Request, Engineer, Manager, StateData, Review, Notification) are properly represented with relationships
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Database migration creates all required tables with proper constraints

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given data integrity requirements, when implementing entity relationships, then foreign key constraints and cascade rules are properly configured
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Database passes referential integrity tests

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given performance requirements, when querying data, then appropriate indexes are created for common query patterns
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Query execution plans show efficient index usage

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement proper indexing and query optimization early

tasks.title: User Role and Permission System Design
tasks.description: Design and implement role-based access control system with Manager, Engineer, and Reviewer roles with appropriate permissions

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given user roles, when accessing system functions, then Managers can assign requests but Engineers cannot
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Role-based authorization tests pass for all user scenarios

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given permission requirements, when users attempt unauthorized actions, then the system properly denies access with appropriate messages
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Security test suite validates all permission boundaries

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given AD integration, when users log in, then their roles are automatically assigned based on organizational groups
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Role assignment automation works correctly with test AD groups

risk_factors.mitigation: Create configurable role mapping system

tasks.title: System Architecture Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive system architecture documentation including component diagrams, data flow, and integration points

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given the system design, when documenting architecture, then all major components and their interactions are clearly defined
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Architecture review meeting approves documentation

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given integration requirements, when documenting external dependencies, then all third-party systems and their interfaces are documented
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Integration checklist matches documented dependencies

risk_factors.mitigation: Regular architecture review and update cycles

tasks.title: Development Environment Standards
tasks.description: Establish coding standards, development tools configuration, and team development workflow procedures

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given development standards, when team members set up development environment, then consistent coding style and tool configuration is achieved
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: All team members can build and run project successfully

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given code quality requirements, when committing code, then automated linting and formatting standards are enforced
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: CI pipeline includes and passes code quality checks

risk_factors.mitigation: Test setup process with different development environments

tasks.title: Email Integration Service
tasks.description: Implement email monitoring service to automatically detect and parse incoming program requests from designated inbox

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given incoming emails to request inbox, when email service processes them, then program requests are automatically created with extracted content
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Email-to-request conversion works with sample emails

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given email parsing requirements, when processing malformed emails, then system handles errors gracefully and notifies administrators
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Error handling tests pass for various email formats

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given reliability requirements, when email service fails, then it recovers automatically and processes pending emails
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Fault tolerance tests demonstrate automatic recovery

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement flexible parsing with fallback to manual processing
Build robust retry and queuing mechanisms

tasks.title: Request Entity and Status Management
tasks.description: Implement core Request entity with status state machine and workflow progression through all defined states

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given request workflow, when status changes are triggered, then requests progress correctly through Open → Assigned → Acknowledged → In Progress → Awaiting Review → Review → Program Ready
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: State machine tests validate all valid transitions

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given business rules, when invalid state transitions are attempted, then system prevents them and maintains data integrity
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Invalid transition tests confirm proper validation

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given audit requirements, when status changes occur, then all transitions are logged with timestamp and user information
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Audit log captures complete status change history

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement comprehensive unit tests for all state combinations

tasks.title: Request Dashboard and List Views
tasks.description: Create Blazor components for displaying request lists with filtering, sorting, and status-based views for different user roles

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given user roles, when accessing request dashboard, then users see appropriate requests based on their permissions and assignments
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Dashboard shows correct data for Manager, Engineer, and Reviewer roles

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given dashboard functionality, when filtering and sorting requests, then results update correctly and performance remains acceptable
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Dashboard handles 1000+ requests with sub-second response times

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given real-time requirements, when request status changes, then dashboard updates automatically without page refresh
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: SignalR integration provides real-time status updates

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement pagination and lazy loading

tasks.title: Priority and Escalation Rule Engine
tasks.description: Implement configurable rule engine for request prioritization and automatic escalation based on timing and priority levels

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given priority rules, when requests are created, then they are automatically assigned appropriate priority levels based on configurable criteria
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Priority assignment tests cover all defined criteria

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given escalation timeouts, when high priority requests remain unacknowledged after 4-5 hours, then automatic escalation is triggered
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Escalation timing tests validate timeout behavior

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given configuration requirements, when business rules change, then administrators can update priority and escalation rules without code changes
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Configuration interface allows rule modification

risk_factors.mitigation: Start with simple rules and iterate based on feedback

tasks.title: Request Detail View and Edit Interface
tasks.description: Create detailed request view with editing capabilities for authorized users and comprehensive request information display

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given request details, when viewing a request, then all relevant information is displayed including status history, assignments, and comments
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Detail view shows complete request timeline

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given edit permissions, when authorized users modify request details, then changes are saved and audit logged
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Edit functionality works correctly with proper authorization

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given data validation, when invalid data is entered, then appropriate error messages guide user correction
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Client and server validation provides clear feedback

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement incremental validation with user feedback

tasks.title: User Management and Profile System
tasks.description: Implement user profile management system with Engineer and Manager entities, specialties, and team assignments

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given user management, when users access the system, then their profiles are automatically populated from AD integration
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: AD sync creates and updates user profiles correctly

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given engineer specialties, when assignments are made, then specialist matching is available to managers
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Specialty-based assignment suggestions work correctly

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given team management, when team structures change, then assignments and permissions update appropriately
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Team management interface maintains data consistency

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement fallback manual profile management

tasks.title: Assignment Management System
tasks.description: Implement request assignment functionality for managers with workload balancing and automated triage capabilities

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given manager permissions, when assigning requests, then managers can select from available engineers based on specialties and workload
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Assignment interface shows engineer availability and specialization

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given automated triage, when requests are created, then system suggests appropriate engineer assignments based on configurable rules
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Triage suggestions achieve 80% acceptance rate in testing

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given workload management, when assignments are made, then engineer capacity limits are respected and alerts generated for overallocation
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Workload protection prevents over-assignment

risk_factors.mitigation: Start with simple client-based rules and iterate

tasks.title: Email Notification System
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive email notification system with action buttons for assignment responses and status updates

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given assignment notifications, when requests are assigned, then engineers receive emails with Accept, Decline, and Reassign buttons
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Email buttons trigger correct system actions when clicked

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given notification targeting, when assignments are made, then assigned engineer gets action buttons while team members get informational notifications
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Button visibility matches user roles and assignment status

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given email reliability, when email delivery fails, then system retries and provides alternative notification methods
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Notification delivery tracking shows 95%+ success rate

risk_factors.mitigation: Work with IT to configure proper email permissions
Create modular template system for different notification types

tasks.title: Assignment Response Processing
tasks.description: Implement backend processing for engineer responses to assignments including acceptance, decline, and reassignment workflows

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given assignment responses, when engineers click Accept, then request status changes to Acknowledged and assignment is confirmed
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Accept workflow updates all relevant database records

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given decline handling, when engineers decline assignments, then requests return to Open status and managers are notified
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Decline workflow triggers proper notifications and status updates

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given reassignment, when engineers reassign requests, then new assignments are created and all parties are notified
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Reassignment creates complete audit trail and notifications

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement optimistic locking and proper transaction handling

tasks.title: Team Communication Hub
tasks.description: Create team dashboard for managers to monitor assignments, workloads, and team performance metrics

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given team monitoring, when managers access team dashboard, then current assignments and workload distribution are clearly displayed
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Dashboard provides clear team workload visibility

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given performance tracking, when viewing team metrics, then assignment response times and completion rates are shown
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Metrics display matches calculated performance data

risk_factors.mitigation: Start with basic metrics and expand based on feedback

tasks.title: Assignment Security and Authorization
tasks.description: Implement security controls to ensure only authorized users can make assignments and access assignment functions

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given authorization rules, when users attempt assignment actions, then only managers and authorized personnel can assign requests
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Authorization tests prevent unauthorized assignment attempts

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given security auditing, when assignment actions occur, then all actions are logged with user identification and timestamps
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Security audit log captures all assignment-related activities

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement granular permission system with clear role definitions

tasks.title: State Diagram Import Service
tasks.description: Implement automated import service for state diagrams with parsing, validation, and data extraction capabilities

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given state diagram files, when import service processes them, then structured data is extracted and stored for validation
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Import service handles common diagram formats and extracts key data

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given data extraction, when diagrams are processed, then validation errors and warnings are identified and reported
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Import validation identifies data quality issues

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given error handling, when import fails, then detailed error messages guide manual intervention
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Error reporting provides actionable feedback for resolution

risk_factors.mitigation: Support multiple formats and provide manual fallback options
Partner with domain experts to define parsing rules

tasks.title: Data Validation Interface
tasks.description: Create interactive validation interface with tree view, diagram view, and data detail panels for engineer data validation

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given validation interface, when engineers validate data, then tree view, diagram view, and data details are displayed simultaneously
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Three-panel interface provides comprehensive data visualization

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given data correction, when engineers identify errors, then they can edit values directly in the interface with immediate validation feedback
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Inline editing saves changes correctly and validates data integrity

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given validation workflow, when data validation begins, then request status automatically changes to In Progress
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Status transition triggers correctly when validation starts

risk_factors.risk: Complex UI requirements for technical data
risk_factors.mitigation: Create prototypes and iterate based on engineer feedback

tasks.title: Data Correction and Version Management
tasks.description: Implement data correction tracking, version history, and rollback capabilities for state data modifications

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given data corrections, when engineers modify imported data, then all changes are tracked with timestamps and user identification
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Change tracking system maintains complete modification history

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given version management, when viewing data history, then engineers can see all previous versions and restore if needed
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Version history interface allows data rollback functionality

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given audit requirements, when data is modified, then approval workflow tracks who made what changes
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Audit trail provides complete data modification accountability

risk_factors.mitigation: Optimize storage and implement efficient querying

tasks.title: Data Validation Completion Workflow
tasks.description: Implement workflow completion logic when data validation is finished and request is ready for review submission

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given validation completion, when engineers finish data validation, then they can mark validation complete and proceed to work completion
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Validation completion interface properly advances workflow

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given work completion, when engineers finish their analysis, then they can submit work for team review
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Work submission triggers review workflow initiation

risk_factors.mitigation: Define clear validation completion checkpoints with stakeholders

tasks.title: Peer Review System
tasks.description: Implement peer review workflow where team members can accept review responsibilities and complete review processes

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given review requests, when work is submitted for review, then team members receive notifications and can accept review responsibility
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Review assignment system notifies team and tracks acceptances

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given review process, when reviewers examine work, then they have access to all relevant data and can provide feedback
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Review interface provides comprehensive work visibility

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given review completion, when reviewers finish, then they can approve work or request adjustments with detailed feedback
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Review completion workflow handles both approval and adjustment scenarios

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement review load balancing and escalation

tasks.title: Review Approval and Program Ready Status
tasks.description: Implement final approval workflow and program ready status transition with document preparation

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given review approval, when reviewers approve work, then request status changes to Program Ready and completion is recorded
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Approval workflow properly transitions requests to final status

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given program completion, when requests reach Program Ready status, then job design is finalized and ready for next phase
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Program ready state provides complete job design deliverable

risk_factors.mitigation: Define specific deliverable requirements with stakeholders

tasks.title: Review Adjustment and Rework Process
tasks.description: Implement adjustment request handling that invalidates approvals and restarts the review process

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given adjustment requests, when reviewers request changes, then all previous approvals are invalidated and work returns to engineer
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Adjustment workflow properly resets approval status

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given rework process, when engineers address feedback, then adjusted work must restart the complete approval process
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Rework requires full re-approval with proper workflow reset

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement clear state machine with comprehensive testing

tasks.title: Review Performance Metrics and Reporting
tasks.description: Implement metrics collection and reporting for review cycle times, adjustment frequencies, and quality indicators

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given review metrics, when reviews are completed, then cycle times and outcomes are automatically tracked
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Metrics collection captures review performance data

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given reporting requirements, when managers view reports, then review performance trends are clearly displayed
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Review reporting provides actionable performance insights

risk_factors.mitigation: Start with basic metrics and expand based on usage

tasks.title: SharePoint Integration
tasks.description: Implement SharePoint integration for automatic document storage and retrieval with proper folder structure

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given SharePoint integration, when programs are completed, then documents are automatically saved to proper SharePoint folders
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: SharePoint integration saves documents with correct naming and structure

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given document management, when retrieving program documents, then SharePoint provides reliable access to completed programs
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Document retrieval works consistently from SharePoint

risk_factors.mitigation: Implement robust error handling and retry mechanisms
Work with IT to configure proper SharePoint permissions

tasks.title: System Integration Testing
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of all system integrations including email, AD, SharePoint, and internal component integration

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given system integrations, when running integration tests, then all external system connections work correctly
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Integration test suite passes for all external dependencies

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given end-to-end workflows, when testing complete request lifecycle, then all workflow steps execute correctly
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: End-to-end tests cover complete request processing from creation to completion

risk_factors.mitigation: Create mock services for independent testing

tasks.title: Performance Testing and Optimization
tasks.description: Conduct performance testing to validate system responsiveness under load and optimize critical workflows

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given performance requirements, when system is under normal load, then response times remain acceptable
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Performance tests demonstrate acceptable response times under expected load

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given scalability testing, when user count increases, then system maintains performance within acceptable thresholds
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Load testing validates system scalability to planned user base

risk_factors.mitigation: Profile and optimize critical paths early

tasks.title: Security Testing and Vulnerability Assessment
tasks.description: Comprehensive security testing including authentication, authorization, data protection, and vulnerability scanning

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given security requirements, when conducting security tests, then all authentication and authorization controls work correctly
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Security test suite validates all access control scenarios

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given vulnerability assessment, when scanning for security issues, then no critical or high-severity vulnerabilities are found
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Vulnerability scan shows acceptable security posture

risk_factors.mitigation: Work with security team to validate integration approach

tasks.title: User Acceptance Testing Preparation
tasks.description: Prepare UAT environment, create test scenarios, and coordinate stakeholder testing activities

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given UAT preparation, when stakeholders test the system, then they can complete all defined test scenarios successfully
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: UAT environment supports all stakeholder testing requirements

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given test scenarios, when running UAT, then all core workflows are validated by actual users
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: UAT scenarios cover all critical business workflows

risk_factors.mitigation: Schedule UAT sessions well in advance and provide flexible testing options

tasks.title: System Documentation and User Training
tasks.description: Create comprehensive system documentation, user guides, and training materials for all stakeholder groups

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given documentation requirements, when users access help materials, then comprehensive guides are available for all system functions
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Documentation covers all user scenarios and system features

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given training materials, when conducting user training, then stakeholders can effectively use the system independently
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Training sessions result in competent system usage

risk_factors.mitigation: Integrate documentation updates into development workflow

tasks.title: Production Deployment Preparation
tasks.description: Prepare production environment, deployment scripts, monitoring, and go-live coordination

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given deployment preparation, when deploying to production, then all infrastructure and configuration requirements are met
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Production deployment checklist is completely satisfied

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given monitoring setup, when system is deployed, then comprehensive monitoring and alerting are functional
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Monitoring system provides visibility into system health and performance

risk_factors.mitigation: Validate deployment in production-like staging environment

tasks.title: Post-Deployment Support and Monitoring
tasks.description: Establish ongoing support procedures, performance monitoring, and continuous improvement processes

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given support processes, when issues arise, then clear escalation and resolution procedures are available
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Support documentation and procedures are established and tested

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given monitoring, when system operates normally, then key performance indicators are tracked and reported
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: KPI tracking provides ongoing system health visibility

risk_factors.mitigation: Plan support capacity and train multiple team members
